Robot¶

class causal_rl_bench.envs.TriFingerRobot(action_mode, observation_mode, skip_frame, normalize_actions, normalize_observations, simulation_time, pybullet_client_full_id, pybullet_client_w_goal_id, pybullet_client_w_o_goal_id, revolute_joint_ids, finger_tip_ids, pinocchio_utils, cameras=None, camera_indicies=array([0, 1, 2]))[source]¶
check_feasibility_of_robot_state()[source]¶

This function checks the feasibility of the current state of the robot (i.e checks if its in penetration with anything now

Returns

feasibility_flag -- A boolean indicating whether the stage is in a collision state or not.

Return type

bool

compute_pd_control_torques(joint_positions)[source]¶

Compute torque command to reach given target position using a PD controller.

Parameters

joint_positions (array-like, shape=(n,)) -- Desired joint positions.

Returns

List of torques to be sent to the joints of the finger in order to reach the specified joint_positions.

check_feasiblity_of_stage()[source]¶

This function checks the feasibility of the current state of the stage (i.e checks if any of the bodies in the simulation are in a penetration mode)

Returns

feasibility_flag -- A boolean indicating whether the stage is in a collision state or not.

Return type

bool
